txt.en: You have defeated a great number of the Globsnaga, the fungus-infested Orcs of Moria, and still you remain standing, having resisted the disease that wreaths these foes. They must be destroyed to the last, for the plague they bear is a perilous invention of the Enemy.

In their madness, the Globsnaga are spreading their poison as far and wide as they can, for such is their masters' wish. If they go unchecked, Moria could become a fungus-infested waste-land, a hazard to the good folk who wish to reclaim Khazad-d√ªm.
